meta.title: Air Quality Solutions For Animal Care Center, Labs | Prana Air
meta.description: Prana Air offers air quality solutions for animal care centers and labs. Ensure a healthier environment for animals with our technology.

animalCare.title: Air quality Solutions for Animal care

hero.title: Air quality solutions for
hero.description: Advanced air quality solutions to enhance the well-being of animals and staff with research accuracy.

pollutants.title: Common Pollutants affecting air quality in
pollutants.description: Animal facilities are highly exposed to various pollutants that are emitted from different sources.

particulateMatter.title: Particulate Matter
particulateMatter.description: Emits from Dust dander bedding particles and feed etc.

ammonia.title: Ammonia
ammonia.description: Produced by animal waste especially from urine.

tvoc.title: TVOC
tvoc.description: Emits from cleaning agents disinfectants and chemicals.

pathogens.title: Pathogens
pathogens.description: Improper storage of feed can produce bacteria viruses and fungi

carbonDioxide.title: Carbon Dioxide
carbonDioxide.description: Inadequate ventilation lead to High levels of CO2

pollutionSources.title: Air pollution sources in Animal facilities
pollutionSources.description: Air pollution in animal facilities releases from various internal and external sources.

challenges.title: Challenges in Maintaining Air Quality
challenges.description: There are several challenges in maintaining good optimal air quality in animal facilities such as:

ventilation.title: Ventilation Systems
ventilation.description: Poor systems affect the proper ventilation and fail to provide adequate air exchange.
ventilation.imgAlt: Ventilation Systems in animal care center

temperatureHumidity.title: Temperature and Humidity Control
temperatureHumidity.description: It is crucial for animal comfort but outdoor weather conditions can affect the control.
temperatureHumidity.imgAlt: Temperature and Humidity Control in animal care center

crossContamination.title: Cross-Contamination
crossContamination.description: Improper airflow management in animal facilities spreads airborne pollutants between rooms.

whoAtRisk.title: Who is at
whoAtRisk.description: Air pollution have significant threat to everyones health in animal facilities.

animalHealth.title: Animal Health
animalHealth.description: Poor air quality in any animal facility can cause respiratory distress infections and other health issues to animals.

staffFarmworkers.title: Staff and farmworkers
staffFarmworkers.description: Poor air quality in animal farms labs care centers can be harmful to staff health as well which can lead to various health conditions.
staffFarmworkers.imgAlt: air quality on the health of Staff and farmworkers

researchOutcomes.title: Research outcomes
researchOutcomes.description: Various air pollutants can affect the outcomes of research as can alter the data or cause invalid conclusions.

guidelines.title: Air pollution
guidelines.subtitle: Check out different countries guidelines for Air quality in Animal Care Centers

cpcsea.title: CPCSEA Guidelines For Laboratory Animal Facility
cpcsea.ariaLabel: CPCSEA Guidelines For Laboratory Animal Facility

environmental.title: Environmental Quality in Animal Production Housing Facilities
environmental.imgAlt: Environmental Quality in Animal Production Housing Facilities
environmental.ariaLabel: Environmental Quality in Animal Production Housing Facilities

laboratory.title: Laboratory Animal Care Facility
laboratory.imgAlt: western illinois university guidelines for laboratory animal care facility

solutions.title: Air quality
solutions.description: Installing air quality solutions throughout the facility allows for managing the air pollution exposure to staff and animals health by providing clean air to breathe. Moreover it helps in better and more accurate research outcomes.

monitor.title: Prana Air Sensible+Air quality monitor
monitor.description: Advanced air quality monitor can measures particulate matter CO2 VOCs and other pollutants.
monitor.imgAlt: prana air sensible indoor air quality monitor for animal facilities

freshAir.title: Prana Air Fresh Air Machine
freshAir.description: Cutting-edge indoor air purifier to filter out various pollutants and provide clean air for everyone.
freshAir.imgAlt: prana air fresh air machine for animal care falicities
freshAir.ctaAriaLabel: Fresh air machine for animal care center

dataDisplay.title: Prana Air Customized TV Display
dataDisplay.description: Customized digital display can install in the facilities for 24/7 real-time data visualization.
dataDisplay.imgAlt: AQI TV app for displaying air quality monitor for animal facilities

features.indoorOutdoor: Access to Both Indoor and Outdoor Data

effects.description: Air quality in animal farm hospitals and labs is crucial for animal health and accurate research outcomes. Here check the comparison:
